column5: My son and I hit Simcoe today, he was just using a hook and worm, caught a ton of perch and rock bass including a couple big ones, I also took one of my favourite pictures of him so far, the one at the front of the boat. I caught a bunch too but was just messing around with my in-line spinners for pike. Note - I’ve been trying to get him to not hold the fish as far out as that lol!
He's got the straightarm down pat!  lol!
Lovely, and that one of him at the bow is certainly a memory forever!
Awesome stuff! Looks like he's got the hang of it!😄😄😄
